text: Andorra competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Andorra entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Bernat Lomero |align=left|50 m butterfly |25.24 |=58 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |58.12 |65 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Mónica Ramírez |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.17 |50 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m backstroke |30.53 |31 |colspan=4|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left rowspan=2|Nàdia Tudó Cubells |align=left|50 m breaststroke |33.67 |39 |colspan=4|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:11.53 |37 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Andorra at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Andorran sport
title: Andorra at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
